lst.name: sentence
lst.str: U.S. officials, however, have said their monitoring of Japanese semiconductor shipments to East Asian countries and Western Europe showed no letup in the dumping and that the Japanese home markets remained shut to American exports.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He has opposed the legislation, saying it would prevent negotiated solutions to trade disputes and, in any case, that existing law was adqeuate to end unfair trade practices.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: White House spokesman Marlin Fitzwater said yesterday: "we do not want a trade war, but we feel that this is the kind of action that requires meaningful action."
